getCountryData: select c.Name,cc.TotalConfirmed,cc.TotalRecovered,cc.TotalDeath,cc.ActiveCases,cc.TotalTests,cc.Population,cc.Source,cc.DateTime from covid_cases cc,country c, Country_Cases coc where cc.ID=coc.Covid_CaseId and coc.CountryCode=c.ID and c.Name=@countryName and cc.DateTime=@dateGiven
allProvinces: select p.Name, cc.TotalConfirmed,cc.TotalRecovered,cc.TotalDeath,cc.ActiveCases,cc.TotalTests,cc.Population,cc.Source,cc.DateTime from Province p, COVID_CASES cc, Province_Cases pc where pc.Covid_CaseId=cc.ID and pc.ProvinceCode=p.ID and cc.DateTime=@dateGiven
province: select p.Name, cc.TotalConfirmed,cc.TotalRecovered,cc.TotalDeath,cc.ActiveCases,cc.TotalTests,cc.Population,cc.Source,cc.DateTime from Province p, COVID_CASES cc, Province_Cases pc where pc.Covid_CaseId=cc.ID and pc.ProvinceCode=p.ID and cc.DateTime=@dateGiven and p.Name=@provinceName
allRegions: select r.Name, cc.TotalConfirmed,cc.TotalRecovered,cc.TotalDeath,cc.ActiveCases,cc.TotalTests,cc.Population,cc.Source, cc.DateTime from Region r,COVID_CASES cc, Region_Cases rc where rc.Covid_CaseId=cc.ID and rc.RegionCode=r.ID and cc.DateTime=@dateGiven
region: select r.Name, cc.TotalConfirmed,cc.TotalRecovered,cc.TotalDeath,cc.ActiveCases,cc.TotalTests,cc.Population,cc.Source, cc.DateTime from Region r,COVID_CASES cc, Region_Cases rc where rc.Covid_CaseId=cc.ID and rc.RegionCode=r.ID and cc.DateTime=@dateGiven and r.Name=@regionName
provinceGraph: select p.Name, cc.TotalConfirmed,cc.TotalRecovered,cc.TotalDeath,cc.ActiveCases,cc.TotalTests,cc.Population,cc.Source ,cc.DateTime from Province p, COVID_CASES cc, Province_Cases pc where pc.Covid_CaseId=cc.ID and pc.ProvinceCode=p.ID and p.Name=@provinceName and cc.DateTime between convert(char(10), dateadd(day,-4,@dateGiven),23) and convert(varchar, @dateGiven, 23)
regionGraph: select r.Name, cc.TotalConfirmed,cc.TotalRecovered,cc.TotalDeath,cc.ActiveCases,cc.TotalTests,cc.Population,cc.Source ,cc.DateTime from Region r, COVID_CASES cc, Region_Cases rc where rc.Covid_CaseId=cc.ID and rc.RegionCode=r.ID and r.Name=@regionName and cc.DateTime between convert(char(10), dateadd(day,-4,@dateGiven),23) and convert(varchar, @dateGiven, 23)
trial: select cc.TotalConfirmed from Province p, COVID_CASES cc, Province_Cases pc where pc.Covid_CaseId=cc.ID and pc.ProvinceCode=p.ID and p.Name=@provinceName and cc.DateTime between convert(char(10), dateadd(day,-4,@dateGiven),23) and convert(varchar, @dateGiven, 23)
